comments: Did not like her at all. She\'s extremely unorganized, rude, grades based on her own opinions. She talks your ear off and says the same things over and over again. Does not explain assignments well and you kind of just have to wing it. She also is constantly marketing her business to her students. Very outdated ideals. Would NOT recommend.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (10)  GROUP PROJECTS (9)  LECTURE HEAVY (7)  Gives good feedback (6)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)
comments: As person having real stage fright, I definitely learned tremendously from this professor. I\'ve been postponing to take this class since I was dreadful speaking in front of people, but she made it possible for me to conquer my fear. She\'ll make you work hard for your grade and you\'ll be proud of yourself after receiving the grade that you deserve.

comments: Professor Freedman is amazing. She\'s a professional speaker and teaches you exactly what you need to succeed in this class and speaking in general. You do a simple outline for each speech and you come up and speak. That simple. 3 individual speeches and 2 group speeches. By the end of the class, everyone who was still there learned to speak well.

comments: AWFUL EXPERIENCE!! Wish I had dropped after first meeting. Very rude, short tempered and makes things more difficult than they need to be! No clarity or consistency. Very egocentric!

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (10)  GROUP PROJECTS (9)  LECTURE HEAVY (7)  Gives good feedback (6)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: GIVES GOOD FEEDBACK  CLEAR GRADING CRITERIA  GROUP PROJECTS
comments: Professor Freedman is a great teacher! I really enjoyed this class and as long as you all the work in, you\'ll enjoy it too. Make sure you read her emails frequently because she sends a lot of those and you don\'t want to miss out on something important and be the only person in class who didn\'t get the memo. Make sure you follow her speech format.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (10)  GROUP PROJECTS (9)  LECTURE HEAVY (7)  Gives good feedback (6)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)
comments: She is a good teacher but you need to pay attention to the small details. The syllabus is informative. This is not a hard class, just nerve racking . Be the 3rd person to do the speech. Don\'t be the last person, it makes you more nervous. The speeches are in outline format (no essays). You have discussion questions at the beginning of each week.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (10)  GROUP PROJECTS (9)  LECTURE HEAVY (7)  Gives good feedback (6)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)
stu_tags: GROUP PROJECTS  LECTURE HEAVY  LOTS OF HOMEWORK
comments: The great thing about Marsha is that she\'s gives all of the assignments at the beginning of the course so you can get ahead if you want. She snaps sometimes but I sat down kept my mouth shut and I was fine. Do pay attention to small details and instructions on assignments. If you open up to her she will too and that\'s where you gain her respect.

tag_professor: Skip class? You won\'t pass. (10)  GROUP PROJECTS (9)  LECTURE HEAVY (7)  Gives good feedback (6)  Tough Grader (3)  Clear grading criteria (2)  LOTS OF HOMEWORK (2)  Caring (1)  Participation matters (1)  Respected (1)
comments: This class was wonderful! Prof. Marsha helps you instantly get over your public speaking fears. I was terrified when I registered and after one week I was comfortable with the idea of standing up in front of a crowd. She is very nice and her instructions are clear. If you follow them, you are sure to give a good speech and get an A.

comments: I took her speech class but it was blende so half of it was online. I only had to go to class 8 times and then it was done! She is strict but other than that she is very nice. She is serious about her class which is fine. Just do your quizzes and prepare your speeches and you will be fine!
